judges.description: OpenAI GPT-5 Mini - Fast and cost-effective
Google Gemini 2.5 Flash - Fast multimodal model
Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5 - High quality reasoning

_comment.default_n: Number of samples per judge (1-10). Higher = more reliable but slower/costlier. Configurable via UI.
_comment.temperature: LLM sampling temperature. 0.8 is research-backed for better calibration than 0.0.
_comment.consensus_threshold: Cross-model std above this triggers flag_for_review.
_comment.flag_low_consensus: If true, results with std > consensus_threshold are flagged.
_comment.report_uncertainty: If true, include std, consensus_level in results.
